chart.name: validated.invoice.per.customer
chart.title: Validated invoice per customer
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.refrence) AS invoice, MONTH(self.invoiceDate) AS month, _party.name AS party FROM Invoice self LEFT JOIN self.party _party WHERE self.status = '2' AND _party.customer = true AND self.invoiceDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate GROUP BY self.invoiceDate, _party.name

chart.name: customer.per.state
chart.title: Customer per state
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.name) AS customer, _address.state.name AS state FROM Party self LEFT JOIN self.address _address WHERE self.customer = true GROUP BY self.name , _address.state.name

chart.name: invoice.per.status.line
chart.title: Invoice per status (Invoice count line)
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.refrence) AS invoice, self.status AS status FROM Invoice self GROUP BY self.status

chart.name: invoice.per.status.bar
chart.title: Invoice per status(Invoice amount bar)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.grossAmount AS amount, self.status AS status FROM Invoice self GROUP BY self.status, self.grossAmount

chart.name: paid.invoices.per.product
chart.title: Paid inoive per category per prodyuct
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.refrence) AS invoice , _invoiceItem.product.category.name AS category FROM Invoice self LEFT JOIN self.invoiceItem AS _invoiceItem WHERE self.status = '3' GROUP BY _invoiceItem.product.category.name

action-view.name: invoice.grid
action-view.title: Invoice
action-view.domain: self.refrence IS NOT NULL AND month(self.invoiceDate)=month(now())-1
